Title: Relates to plastic carryout bags provided by restaurants
Summary: Removes the exemption for restaurants, taverns or similar food service establishments from the New York state bag waste reduction act.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-2801, En Con L (as proposed in S.1508-C & A.2008-C)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to plastic carryout bags provided by restaurants
